Albermarle
Castleview
Dinwiddie
Elandshaven
Elandspark
Florentia
Germiston
Gosforth park
Linmeyer
South Crest
The Hills
Verwoerdpark
Union Free Standing Houses

closed.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng Intermittent Connectivity
closed.description: We are investigating reports of intermittent connectivity on the Afrihost and Vuma Villages networks. Afrihost and Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Vumatel will be doing emergency maintenance tonight between 23:00 and 00:00 to address the issue causing intermittent performance. Clients will experience no connection for brief periods during the maintenance. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost and Vumatel engineers continue to actively troubleshoot the root cause of the intermittent connection on Vuma Villages. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
